use `{{ prefix }}h` to know more.

ticket.descripDisabled: `At the moment the aids are disabled.`
ticket.descripEnable:
@everyone `React with a `📩` to open a ticket.`

Remember that there can only be a maximum of one open ticket per person.
ticket.descripTicket:
<@{{ id }}> your ticket has been requested. React with a '❌' to close the Ticket.

Administrators can also delete their Ticket

clear.errorAdmin: You cannot put negative numbers or delete more than 99 messages
clear.error: You cannot Delete more than 3 messages or put negative numbers
clear.message: <@{{ user }}> delete `{{ number }}` messages of <#{{ channel }}>`
